title: Bayer Announces Fall Savings Program
text:
Subscribe Bayer Announces Fall Savings Program The promotion includes savings on Maxforce FC Magnum Roach Gel, Maxforce FC Select Roach Gel and Temprid SC. October 14, 2015 
RESEARCH TRIANGLE PARK, N.C. – Environmental Science , a division of Bayer CropScience LP , announced its 2015 Fall Savings Program, offering pest management professionals (PMPs) instant savings on multiple Bayer solutions. The exclusive promotion runs through Oct. 30 and gives PMPs the chance to stop fall invaders while saving on a variety of products, including Maxforce FC Magnum Roach Gel, Maxforce FC Select Roach Gel and Temprid SC. "The fall season typically brings with it an increase in pest activity," said Eric Lentz, head of marketing for Bayer’s professional pest management and vector businesses. "We are proud to provide PMPs these cost savings on some of our best-in-class solutions to support them as they serve their customers during this critical season." The following products and savings are available through October 30: •Maxforce FC Magnum o$1.25 off per tube or $15 off per case (12 x 33g reservoirs) o$1.50 off per tube or $30 off per case (5 x (4 - 30g reservoirs) o$3.83 off/400 ml bottle or $23 off/6-bottle case o$6.13 off/900 ml bottle or $49 off/8-bottle case Maxforce FC Magnum provides control of normal and aberrant-feeding cockroaches. "No other bait gel works faster – customers will see results the same day. Consumption is not necessary with this gel. Cockroaches need only to touch the bait to die, as it contains the innovative ContactX technology. Maxforce FC Magnum remains effective for up to one year. Maxforce FC Select is an ideal solution for maintenance control of normal and bait-averse strains of cockroaches. With the active ingredient, fipronil, Maxforce FC Select kills cockroaches within eight hours by ingestion or contact, also known as the Domino Effect, which is proven to work effectively even when sanitation is poor and competing food sources are available. Temprid SC provides a flexible label that allows indoor and outdoor use. It combines the fast-acting, broad-spectrum control of beta-cyfluthrin with the systemic residual control of imidacloprid to provide premium performance and efficacy. Temprid SC is a leading perimeter pest control product that fights indoor pests like spiders, cockroaches and crickets, as well as outdoor and wood-infesting pests like ants, scorpions, ticks and drywood termites. PMPs can take advantage of these savings by visiting their local Bayer distributors. For more information on the fall promotion, visit www.BackedbyBayer.com , or contact your local Bayer field sales representative or Bayer Customer Service at 1-800-331-2867. Always read and follow label instructions. Expanded Label for Contrac All-Weather Blox October 16, 2015 
Bell Laboratories announced that Contrac All-Weather Blox is now available with an amended label for approved use on 11 additional species. Read More Service Pro to Debut ServeSensor at PestWorld October 16, 2015 
ServSensor is a sensor-based monitoring device and software solution that keeps an eye on activity in bait stations, traps, and sends notice of all occurring wildlife and rodent activity. Read More ‘Duck Dynasty’ Star Si to Appear at Oldham Chemicals PestWorld Booth October 15, 2015 
Oldham Chemicals Company invites PestWorld '15 attenddees to its booth (#441) to meet Si Robertson, one of the stars of the reality television program "Duck Dynasty." Read More The Pulse
